name: Web3 Development Fundamentals
description: Explore the fundamentals of Web3 development, blockchain technologies, and decentralized applications. Learn how to build dApps using Ethereum and Solidity.

name: iOS App Development with Swift
description: Learn how to create beautiful iOS applications using Swift and SwiftUI. This workshop covers everything from basic UI components to advanced app architecture.

name: AI for Creative Professionals
description: Discover how artificial intelligence can enhance your creative workflow. Learn to leverage AI tools for design, content creation, and ideation.

name: Cybersecurity Essentials
description: Understand the fundamentals of cybersecurity and how to protect digital assets from common threats. Perfect for IT professionals and security enthusiasts.

name: Digital Marketing Strategy
description: Create effective digital marketing strategies that drive growth. Learn about SEO, content marketing, social media, and analytics.
